name: Unfortunate Gambling
description:
“Unfortunate Gambling” is a story-heavy JRPG, created using the Unity development environment as part of a bachelor thesis on the subject of “Practical Evaluation of Differences in linear and nonlinear Storytelling while interactively Imparting a narrative”.

Accompany Jack as he is confronted with various aspects and problems of his gambling addiction. In addition, he keeps getting advice from the mysterious bartender. Play the game in linear mode and experience the story, or dare to use the non-linear mode, in which your decisions influence the story.

Can you get Jack to rethink his decisions?

Key Features:

  • Short, thrilling and emotional storyline.
  • Play the story either linear on a fixed path or non-linear and be able to change the outcome of the story.
  • While playing, learn about gambling addiction and the problems it can cause, as well as how you can find help.

“Unfortunate Gambling” is the prequel to the upcoming game “A Bar Named Styx”.
